description: ElevenLabs is an AI-powered voice synthesis company specializing in ultra-realistic text-to-speech and voice cloning technology.
name: elevenLabs
title: ElevenLabs

actions.description: Turn text into sound effects for your videos, voice-overs or video games using the most advanced sound effects model in the world.
actions.name: createSoundEffect

properties.description: The text that will get converted into a sound effect.
properties.name: text
properties.label: Text

actions.title: Create Sound Effect

actions.description: Converts text into speech using a voice of your choice and returns audio.
actions.name: createSpeech

properties.description: Voice you want to use for converting the text into speech.
properties.name: voiceId
properties.label: Voice

properties.description: Text you want to convert into speech.
properties.name: text
properties.label: Text

actions.title: Create Speech

actions.description: Generate speech from text with precise character-level timing information for audio-text synchronization.
actions.name: createSpeechWithTiming

properties.description: Base64 encoded audio data
properties.name: audio_base64

properties.description: Base64 encoded audio data
properties.name: audio_base64

properties.description: Voice you want to use for converting the text into speech.
properties.name: voiceId
properties.label: Voice

properties.description: Text you want to convert into speech.
properties.name: text
properties.label: Text

actions.title: Create Speech With Timing

actions.description: Transcribe an audio or video file.
actions.name: createTranscript

properties.description: The detected language code (e.g. ‘eng’ for English).
properties.name: language_code

properties.description: The confidence score of the language detection (0 to 1).
properties.name: language_probability

properties.description: The raw text of the transcription.
properties.name: text

properties.description: List of words with their timing information.
properties.name: words

properties.description: The word or sound that was transcribed.
properties.name: text

properties.description: The start time of the word or sound in seconds
properties.name: start

properties.description: The end time of the word or sound in seconds
properties.name: end

properties.description: The type of the word or sound. ‘audio_event’ is used for non-word sounds like laughter or footsteps. Allowed values: word, spacing and audio_event.
properties.name: type

properties.description: The detected language code (e.g. ‘eng’ for English).
properties.name: language_code

properties.description: The confidence score of the language detection (0 to 1).
properties.name: language_probability

properties.description: The raw text of the transcription.
properties.name: text

properties.description: List of words with their timing information.
properties.name: words

properties.description: The word or sound that was transcribed.
properties.name: text

properties.description: The start time of the word or sound in seconds
properties.name: start

properties.description: The end time of the word or sound in seconds
properties.name: end

properties.description: The type of the word or sound. ‘audio_event’ is used for non-word sounds like laughter or footsteps. Allowed values: word, spacing and audio_event.
properties.name: type

properties.description: The ID of the model to use for transcription, currently only ‘scribe_v1’ is available.
properties.name: model_id
properties.label: Model

properties.description: The file to transcribe. All major audio and video formats are supported. The file size must be less than 1GB.
properties.name: file
properties.label: File
